channel.title: New to scripting/servers. need some tips. =D
channel.description:
So heres the deal:
I've recentely become more and more interested in creating my own server, and from what i hear its not too bad. I know my way around a computer, but am new to scripting. I would really really really appreciate just some tips or even a guide on how to get started. I pick things up quickly, i just need some help getting into the right direction such as {needed downloads and other things.} Any help is apprecaited. Post here i guess or even email me at thexfaultxline@yahoo.com
Thanks.

item.title: New to scripting/servers. need some tips. =D

item.description:

you could follow many of the tutorials, learn some java then your basically there
